Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: My old man tried to force on me a notion of what it was to be a 'man.' And it destroyed my dad

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I was shot in the wrist when I was a kid. Deliberately

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: The words I overuse are all adverbs

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I am always relaxed

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all working together; that's the secret

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: The way management treats associates is exactly how the associates will treat the customers

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: High expectations are the key to everything

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Celebrate your successes. Find some humor in your failures

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Swim upstream. Go the other way. Ignore the conventional wisdom

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to success is to get out into the store and listen to what the associates have to say

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us profit from being corrected - if we're corrected in a positive way

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: I probably have traveled and walked into more variety stores than anybody in America

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: What am I supposed to haul my dogs around in, a Rolls-Royce?

Quote.Author: Sam Walton
Quote.QuoteValue: Capital isn't scarce; vision is

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't judge me. I made a lot of money

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be willing to ask questions that almost no one else would ask

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: The best part about poker is there's no down side

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: It's great when you have people who will speak passionately and honestly about what they are doing

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: I get maximum satisfaction out of buying children's clothes online

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think the show would be funny to you if you didn't already have a base of information

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: I think NASCAR's coming to Canada now so it'll take on a whole new relevance. Be afraid

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the show does better with newsmakers and politicians than it does with actors

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't for what goes on in the world of politics, we wouldn't really have much of a show

Quote.Author: Samantha Bee
Quote.QuoteValue: I learn something in the interviews from time to time

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: Brokenness is the operative issue of our time - broken souls, broken hearts, broken places

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: All advocacy is, at its core, an exercise in empathy

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: Countries that intervene militarily rarely do so out of pure altruism

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things that a president needs in the face of genocide is resolve

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the United States is the greatest country on Earth. I really do

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: Foreign policy is an explicitly amoral enterprise

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I happen to miss the Constitution; I thought it was a good document

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: Serving in the executive branch is very different than sounding off from an academic perch

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: U.N. Security Council resolutions are only as effective as their enforcement

Quote.Author: Samantha Power
Quote.QuoteValue: My style in diplomacy is my style as a human being - I'm very direct and very honest

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: You always have two choices: your commitment versus your fear

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The ultimate mystery is one's own self

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Alcohol gives you infinite patience for stupidity

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: When you lose a lover it's like getting a bad haircut. It grows back in time

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: What have I got? No looks, no money, no education. Just talent

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Sober up, and you see and hear everything you'd been able to avoid hearing before

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is never as bad as a nightmare, as the mental tortures we inflict on ourselves

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I had more clothes than I had closets, more cars than garage space, but no money

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything Michael Jackson does on stage is exactly right

Quote.Author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't anything special as a father. But I loved them and they knew it

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: I see couples fighting about the stupidest things. You just have to rise above everything

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason my voice is sounding more passionate is because I'm singing directly from the heart

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you're afraid to fall in love with a chick, but she sucks you in anyway

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to enlighten people

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: When they brought Roth back into the picture, obviously I didn't go along with that too well

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: I looked at Mick Jagger and Keith Richards and the boys up there thinking, I want to be that

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't think I'd be around 30 years later

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: To stay a great singer or guitar player, you've got to do it 24/7. That's what I do

Quote.Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote.QuoteValue: I think all the bad blood started when Geffen released a greatest hits package of my solo stuff

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: My situation is different from Mark's. I'm not looking for home runs, I'm looking for the playoffs

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: Make yourself comfortable in everything you do

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a bad day in baseball, and start thinking about it, you will have 10 more

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to get fat

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not keeping track, but the record is there for someone to break

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a racist

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like controversy

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: I have not broken the laws of the United States or the laws of the Dominican Republic

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always an honor to represent your country

Quote.Author: Sammy Sosa
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're in the middle of a pennant race, you can't go up there thinking about home runs

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: Every word is like an unnecessary stain on silence and nothingness

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't go on. I'll go on

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: There's man all over for you, blaming on his boots the fault of his feet

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: To find a form that accommodates the mess, that is the task of the artist now

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do not love me I shall not be loved If I do not love you I shall not love

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all born mad. Some remain so

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: Habit is a great deadener

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: In the landscape of extinction, precision is next to godliness

Quote.Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are all we have

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Neither irony or sarcasm is argument

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Logic is like the sword - those who appeal to it, shall perish by it

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people have never learned that one of the main aims in life is to enjoy it

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: We shall never get people whose time is money to take much interest in atoms

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: People are always good company when they are doing what they really enjoy

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like music; it must be composed by ear, feeling, and instinct, not by rule

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us be grateful to the mirror for revealing to us our appearance only

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Any fool can tell the truth, but it requires a man of some sense to know how to lie well

Quote.Author: Samuel Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Human life is as evanescent as the morning dew or a flash of lightning

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: If I look confused it is because I am thinking

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me a smart idiot over a stupid genius any day

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll take fifty percent efficiency to get one hundred percent loyalty

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's have some new cliches

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm willing to admit that I may not always be right, but I am never wrong

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anyone should write their autobiography until after they're dead

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: A bachelor's life is no life for a single man

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I never liked you, and I always will

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Any man who goes to a psychiatrist ought to have his head examined

Quote.Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote.QuoteValue: A verbal contract isn't worth the paper it's written on

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Not everybody goes to movies to get their life changed

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been fortunate to be in films that are classic, that are going to be around

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually think I have an audience member's sensibility about going to the movies

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have an opportunity to use your voice you should use it

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I get paid all day, every day, which is almost too much for a sensitive artist

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I did 'Formula 51' because I got to run around Liverpool in a kilt, with golf clubs

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been to jail. I've never been arrested. I've never been locked up

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope Obama gets scary in the next four years, 'cuz he ain't gotta worry about getting re-elected

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love comic books and I love anime

Quote.Author: Samuel L. Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm not working, I like to play golf

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is like the sun, which, as we journey toward it, casts the shadow of our burden behind us

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: Enthusiasm... the sustaining power of all great action

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: Man cannot aspire if he looked down; if he rise, he must look up

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is one of the best educators of practical character

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: The spirit of self-help is the root of all genuine growth in the individual

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: The shortest way to do many things is to do only one thing at once

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason why so little is done, is generally because so little is attempted

Quote.Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote.QuoteValue: He who never made a mistake, never made a discovery

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is a sheltering tree

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: To sentence a man of true genius, to the drudgery of a school is to put a racehorse on a treadmill

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: I have seen great intolerance shown in support of tolerance

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: He is the best physician who is the most ingenious inspirer of hope

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: No one does anything from a single motive

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: A mother is a mother still, The holiest thing alive

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: Swans sing before they die - 'twere no bad thing should certain persons die before they sing

Quote.Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote.QuoteValue: How like herrings and onions our vices are in the morning after we have committed them

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a true believer in karma. You get what you give, whether it's bad or good

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: I've lived next door to people all my life. I don't know how cute they think I am

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: After a while, you have no idea how old you are because you've lied so many times

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something sexy about a gut. Not a 400-pound beer gut, but a little paunch. I love that

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: Why is it that when we get older, we get more fearful?

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done all my tricks. I'm tired of myself

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every human being has a level of melancholy in life and in general

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: I love raw cookie dough, right out of the tube. The other thing I eat is marshmallow fluff

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: Free is the best. Anything free is good

Quote.Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote.QuoteValue: Does age matter? Time doesn't matter

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know that there are any short cuts to doing a good job

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact is, we are a nine-member court that sits on cases

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to retire from retirement

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: The power I exert on the court depends on the power of my arguments, not on my gender

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: We have a complex system of government. You have to teach it to every generation

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: The freedom to criticize judges and other public officials is necessary to a vibrant democracy

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: Each of us brings to our job, whatever it is, our lifetime of experience and our values

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: A moment of silence is not inherently religious

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: Having family responsibilities and concerns just has to make you a more understanding person

Quote.Author: Sandra Day O'Connor
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a cattle rancher when I was young, because it was what I knew and I loved it

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't judge others. I say if you feel good with what you're doing, let your freak flag fly

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: A squirrel is just a rat with a cuter outfit!

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: I developed a really strong work ethic, and I don't take anything for granted

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be friends with a squirrel! A squirrel is just a rat with a cuter outfit

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your instincts and do not let other people's opinion of you become your opinion of yourself

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Men who are too good looking are never good in bed because they never had to be

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: I like my money right where I can see it... hanging in my closet

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Every once in awhile, a girl has to indulge herself

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Can you really forgive if you can't forget?

Quote.Author: Sarah Jessica Parker
Quote.QuoteValue: Do we need distance to get close?

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: To win this war, we need a commander in chief, not a professor of law standing at the lectern

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: The Republican Party would be really smart to absorb as much of the Tea Party movement as possible

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: My fellow citizens, the American Presidency is not supposed to be a journey of personal discovery

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact that drilling won't solve every problem is no excuse to do nothing at all

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: Buck up or stay in the truck

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: We need independents, we need the GOP, we need Reagan Democrats

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: When we talk about fighting for our country, we're talking about our vote, our vote is our arms

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: Polls? Nah... they're for strippers and cross country skiers

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: Folks, this government isn't too big to fail, it's too big to succeed

Quote.Author: Sarah Palin
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama's capitalism is a capitalism of connections

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone self-Googles. And, I have, of course, the Google alert

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people say my humor focuses too much on stereotypes. It doesn't. It focuses on facts

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't set out to offend or shock, but I also don't do anything to avoid it

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to do drama if it was interesting

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: They've got great parents; I'm just trying to be the fun uncle

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I'm not afraid to say something if I think it's funny, even if it's harsh or racist

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a ton of Holocaust stuff, and some of it is really hard core

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: Smells definitely do have a crazy impact on me

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: I still have highs and lows, maybe I don't cry salty tears as much

Quote.Author: Sarah Silverman
Quote.QuoteValue: I love making videos on my couch. You can put those on the Internet fast. I can express myself

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: Ain't no man can avoid being born average, but there ain't no man got to be common

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: Just take the ball and throw it where you want to. Throw strikes. Home plate don't move

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: I never rush myself. See, they can't start the game without me

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: My pitching philosophy is simple - keep the ball way from the bat

Quote.Author: Satchel Paige
Quote.QuoteValue: If your stomach disputes you, lie down and pacify it with cool thoughts

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: In our business, things look like a failure until they're not. It's pretty binary transitions

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: Cloud is just emerging, but it's high growth

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: From Xbox in the previous generation to Xbox One, it's fundamentally transformed

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: Every opportunity I got, I took it as a learning experience

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is going to be connected to cloud and data... All of this will be mediated by software

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: Businesses and users are going to use technology only if they can trust it

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe men and women should get equal pay for equal work

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you deserve a raise, you should just ask

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: Iran is a complete Windows country when it comes to the Office automation side

Quote.Author: Satya Nadella
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we would be dead and gone if we were just mostly failing

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The first step in community organization is community disorganization

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: No politician can sit on a hot issue if you make it hot enough

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is not only what you have but what the enemy thinks you have

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest enemy of individual freedom is the individual himself

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Tactics mean doing what you can with what you have

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Last guys don't finish nice

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: History is a relay of revolutions

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Ridicule is man's most potent weapon

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: A tactic that drags on too long becomes a drag

Quote.Author: Saul Alinsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The threat is usually more terrifying than the thing itself

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody needs his memories. They keep the wolf of insignificance from the door

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Conquered people tend to be witty

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is only as good as what he loves

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever wants to reach a distant goal must take small steps

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: Goodness is achieved not in a vacuum, but in the company of other men, attended by love

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: What is art but a way of seeing?

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: When we ask for advice, we are usually looking for an accomplice

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write

Quote.Author: Saul Bellow
Quote.QuoteValue: People can lose their lives in libraries. They ought to be warned

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: I still eat a burger at a counter with ketchup dripping down my face

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I'm taking time off, all I'm thinking about is working

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been very determined, ever since I was a little girl, to make my way

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not anxious to starve myself. For me, it's not at all sexy to be ultra-thin

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in finding a soulmate

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: I value my privacy and my personal life - and I certainly don't exploit my personal life

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to have a crush on someone. It feels like you're alive, you know?

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happiest when I have something to focus my energy on

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the best things for a woman to hear is that she is sexy

Quote.Author: Scarlett Johansson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as an aura of mystery anymore. It doesn't exist. That's a thing of the past

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never underestimate the stupidity of the general public

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: The only risk of failure is promotion

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I respectfully decline the invitation to join your hallucination

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing more dangerous than a resourceful idiot

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Every skill you acquire doubles your odds of success

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Remind people that profit is the difference between revenue and expense. This makes you look smart

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: We must develop knowledge optimization initiatives to leverage our key learnings

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's form proactive synergy restructuring teams

Quote.Author: Scott Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have any trouble sounding condescending, find a Unix user to show you how it's done

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: And sex is definitely part of college life

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't swim at the level I used to. I had to retire because of an injury to my shoulder

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't live a normal life, how do you relate to people?

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see the point in signing on to do something and then leaving

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I bought a house in LA, hanging out there and spending a lot of time in Toronto, but not much

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: And once you cease to be a real person, you stop being a good actor

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, I love California, but LA to me is still a strange place

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I just would like to spend more time in New York City

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's such good writing now on television and I don't see a lot of great writing on films sadly

Quote.Author: Scott Speedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Canada, our industry is still somewhat based in America's industry

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always associated the moment of writing with a moment of lift, of joy, of unexpected reward

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: The Ireland I now inhabit is one that these Irish contemporaries have helped to imagine

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: If poetry and the arts do anything, they can fortify your inner life, your inwardness

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: I have begun to think of life as a series of ripples widening out from an original center

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if the hopes you started out with are dashed, hope has to be maintained

Quote.Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if the last move did not succeed, the inner command says move again
